articles.title: Stock Market Highlights: Sensex ends 656 pts lower, Nifty gives up 17,950; Infy, Asian Paints fall 3% - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Stock Market Highlights: Indian equity benchmarks Sensex and Nifty50 suffered sharp losses on Wednesday, tracking weakness across global markets. Losses in IT, consumer and private sector financial stocks pulled the headline indices lower, though gains in aut…
articles.content:
Market At Close | Nifty below 18,000 for 1st time in last 8 sessions

articles.title: Preview: Women's Asian Cup a massive opportunity and equally big challenge for India - ESPN India
articles.description: It all comes down to the next week, three games and an outing that will determine the course of Indian women's football for the near future.
articles.content:
Coach Thomas Dennerby wants the Indian football team to be relaxed, self-confident and treat their three group matches at the 2022 AFC Women's Asian Cup like any other match.

articles.title: Attack On Titan exhibition coming to Singapore's ArtScience Museum in February - CNA
articles.description: Running from Feb 19 to Jul 3, this is the exhibition's Southeast Asian premiere and coincides with the screening of The Final Season Part 2 anime now on Netflix.
articles.content:
If youre a huge fan of the hit manga and anime, Attack On Titan, get yourself to the ArtScience Museum from Feb 19 to experience the series in a whole new way.
